title: The Cat = Il Gatto
creator_credit: Michele Gandin, Roberto Capanno and Radiotelevisione Italiana
brief_description: Scenes of Siamese kittens at play with commentary in Italian. Shows care of the kittens by mother cats at play and at feeding time. Child and adult alternate with commentary.
creator_credit_for_label: Michele Gandin, Roberto Capanno and Radiotelevisione Italiana
